snippet: FRANKFURT--Ruth, 90, loving and adored wife of the late Daniel for 62 years, mother of Judith (James R. Oestreich) and Jaclyn (Mark Cahn), proud grandmother of Jordan and Joey Frankfurt Cahn, sister of the late Gittel Silverberg (Mervin) and Esther Beckman (Irving), cousin and best friend of Fayge Cohen (the late Solly), on May 19, 2016. Teacher extraordinaire and dedicated board member of Westchester Reform Temple. Montreal's gift to New York. Leading spirit of ARZA/World Union and other Zionist causes. Her guidance, love and enthusiasm will be deeply missed. Service: Monday, May 23 at 11am, Westchester Reform Temple (WRT), 255 Mamaroneck Road, Scarsdale, NY. Donations: WRT or Americans for Peace Now (www.peacenow.org). 1/3
